armament.description:
Types - 0 - Cabeza
         1 - Accesorios 
         2 - Cuerpo
         3 - Arma

armament.name: Sharp Dagger
armament.description: Short dagger given to you by Frost, it's not much but it will be useful to defend yourself.

armament.name: Rusty Dagger
armament.description: Old and blunt-edged dagger, better than nothing at all, I guess.

armament.name: Crimson Remembrance Pendant
armament.description: Pendant given to you by Mihaela some time ago, it contains a key inside.
